title: Girl 14, in ‘extreme danger’ after she was ‘abducted by her mother’s ex-boyfriend’
text:
Isabel Hicks has been missing since last Monday and is believed to be with her mother’s ex-boyfriend Bruce Lynch. (Picture: Louisa Sheriff’s Department/Facebook)

Investigators say a fourteen-year-old girl is in ‘extreme danger’ after she was allegedly abducted by her mother’s ex-boyfriend over a week ago.

Isabel Hicks disappeared from her home in Bumpass, Virginia on October 21 and is now believed to be with 33-year-old Bruce Lynch, who had been in a relationship with the teen’s mother.

Authorities say it is unclear if Hicks went with Lynch voluntarily, but he is believed to be armed with a handgun and he has recently expressed suicidal ideas.

Spokesman for the Louisa county Sheriff’s Office Donnie Lowe, told WPBF: ‘There isn’t any evidence that makes us think Isabel was taken forcibly. However, she’s a very young 14-year-old who hasn’t had any contact with her family since last Monday.

Authorities say Lynch is travelling in a silver-blue Toyota Matrix and added that Lynch is believed to have recently bought some tarps, which they said should still be in the vehicle. Police said the pair might be camping in the woods.

Lynch and Hicks are believed to have been seen Monday night in Montpelier, Virginia after a woman reported that they showed up at her front door during a brief encounter, according to WTVR.

The unnamed woman said the pair knocked on her door, but fled into the woods after they were told they were wanted.

Police responded to the house and locked down a half-mile perimeter, but Lynch and Hicks have still not been found.

On Monday, Louisa County Detective Chuck Love said: ‘It’s definitely like trying to find a needle in a haystack.’

‘We ask everyone hearing this to continue being those extra set of eyes.’

FBI Agent Dave Johnson said: ‘Bruce, as parents let’s appeal to you. You know Isabel should be home safe with her parents.

‘Warm, rested and protected I’m sure you want what’s best for her. Please return Isabel to a safe location.’
description: Isabel Hicks disappeared from her home in Bumpass, Virginia on October 21 and is now believed to be with 33-year-old Bruce Lynch.
